title: [Onboarding] Welcome screens
body:
These screens are displayed to new users after they generate their key. 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11790366/64327799-96b17100-cfcc-11e9-94ca-f6c11197ca4c.png)

Acceptance criteria:

1. pixel perfect
1. welcome screen is shown
1. Browse public chats prompt is shown


Figma: https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=1669%3A42

âž¤ Rachel Hamlin commented:

We should be able to close this one this week.
Kudos on merging PR #8234 @siphiuel! Is this your next task?

âž¤ Oskar Thoren commented:

I'm having some problems following this, a month ago it was "close this one in a week", which was with dev. Now it's back with design. What does this mean?
Oh wait, I'm wrong. @flexsurfer changed it back to design. @errorists what's changing with this screen?

âž¤ Rachel Hamlin commented:

Wrike/Unito bot did it automatically. No one changed it in Wrike or on GH.

@rachelhamlin we've commissioned some wonderful illustrators to come up with unique artwork for this screen. It's still WIP because of that. edit: pictured above is a sketch we have currently, the finished illustration will be rendered in 3D. The text and button, that's finalised unless you want any changes to copy.
Got it! Thanks. I'll those tasks in Wrike.

@rachelhamlin this one is done, I don't foresee us changing the illustration. You might want to take a look at the text used there, I'm not sure who wrote the copy and I can't ask Hester ;)

I'm still not sure about the text on the button too, `Okay` lacks any enthusiasm. This should be more welcoming, ideally I'd use `Get started` but we already have that previously. wdyt?

[Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=4277%3A337)
[Image assets](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/g1t61e68bcajj5m/AAAR174DUHHmgBpUPue6bfEka?dl=0)

Preview

![Welcome](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4932774/64256876-95c50480-cf24-11e9-97ec-1d6fe8e8b138.jpg)

Great! How about:

`Let's go` for the button? 

I'm okay with the copy beneath the welcome. I would maybe emphasise `Welcome to Status!` with the exclamation point, and punctuate the subtext either with a period or not at all, e.g. `Set up your crypto wallet, invite friends to chat and browse decentralized apps`

(If the screens match Figma in practice, we've been a bit inconsistent with our punctuation)

Thoughts?
Sounds good, I like the `Let's go`! I applied the changes and the absolute worst case scenario, Hester with her newfound superpowers of changing text in production can come to the rescue later :)
ðŸ™‚ Totally, a quick fix. Thank you! I'll put a bounty on this one.

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done

@jorgeluisrezende you're approved! Andrey added the screens to the issue. It's (1) [this splash screen](https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=4228%3A15) with the hero illustration, and (2) [this empty `Chat` screen](https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=927%3A15470) with a CTA to join public chats in a box. Is it clear?
The empty Chat screen links to the outdated design, [this is the one we should be using](https://www.figma.com/file/dEIljL7UPbXgsZUA0Q4qlE5E/Onboarding?node-id=1669%3A42)

My mistakeâ€”I prematurely paid out this bounty to @acolytec3. I was trying to pay him for his work on #8027.  

But that's okay. I will pay @elegant651 for this work either on this bounty, or via #9054 when completed.

Minor question, but I want to confirm @errorists:

Do we display _both_ of these screens each time a user generates a new key, regardless of whether they have other Status keys already?

Good question, 
Welcome to Status, can't hurt, I would show it each time. We're very welcoming.
The empty state for chats, also show each time, the alternative would be a sad empty list and they can dismiss it.
Cool, agreed, both screens for all new users then. ðŸ‘

I finished welcome page, and move into empty state chat page. But, where can I get image assets on this page? like multiple icons and close button. 
Also, how to retrieve suggested tags below 'Follow your interests in one of ...'?

Apologies for delay @elegant651! How about these for suggested channels?

#introductions #chitchat #status
#crypto #tech #music  #movies
